title: Classical Chinese Poetry Pedagogy Design for International Chinese Education: Text Analysis and Statistical Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate proficiency in modern Chinese comprehension and basic literary appreciation skills
context.additional_context: Designed for science practitioners to expand cultural insights through classical poetry and experience an integrated approach to language learning, considering smartphone-based limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze genre-specific features of classical Chinese poetry (e.g., "Jueju," "Lüshi") with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners complete a project evaluating text selection patterns by applying statistical methods (frequency analysis, distribution mapping).
Learners create presentation materials explaining the cultural implications of classical Chinese poetry in connection with scientific thinking (pattern recognition, data interpretation).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
